units.title: Detach hPSC cells
units.text: H9, HS999, HS1001, and TH-Cre hPSC cells were detached from the culture dish with 0.5 mM Accutase (Thermo Fisher Scientiﬁc, #A1110501) to yield a single cell
units.rationale: Provides single-cell suspension for downstream plating.

units.title: Initiate differentiation by plating
units.text: Differentiation was initiated by plating 2500 single cells in each well of (Miltenyi, #130-103-456), 400 ng/ml SHH-C24II (Miltenyi, #130-095-727), and a 96-well U-bottom plate (Corning, #CLS7007) in iPS Brew with 10 µM Y-27632 1.5 μM CHIR99021 (Miltenyi, #130-106-539), and in the presence of 200 mM dihydrochloride (Miltenyi, #130-106-538), as previously described27.
units.rationale: Sets up the initial conditions for midbrain patterning.

units.title: Transfer embryoid bodies to differentiation medium
units.text: After three L-glutamine (Thermo Fisher Scientiﬁc, #25030081) and 10,000 U/mL penicillindays in culture, embryoid bodies were transferred to differentiation medium streptomycin (Thermo Fisher Scientiﬁc, #15140122).
units.rationale: Moves aggregates to a medium that supports further lineage specification.

units.title: Transfer organoids to 24-well plate on day 11
units.text: On day 11, developing VM organoids were transferred to a 24-well plate containing 1:50 Neurobasal medium, B27 supplement without vita-
units.rationale: Provides a larger culture format for continued maturation.

units.title: Add BDNF and ascorbic acid on day 14
units.text: On day 14, 20 ng/mL BDNF (Miltenyi, #130-096-286) and 200 µM L-Ascorbic acid (Sigma-Aldrich, #A4403-100MG) were added.

units.title: Add db-cAMP and DAPT from day 16 onward
units.text: From day 16 onward, 0.5 mM db-cAMP (Sigma-Aldrich, #D0627-1G) and 1 μM DAPT (R&D Systems, #2634) were added to the culture.
units.rationale: Enhances dopaminergic differentiation and inhibits Notch signaling.

units.title: Silk scaffold preparation and hPSC integration
units.text: Silk-scaffold preparation and hPSC integration. A 20 µL droplet of Biosilk protein solution (BioLamina, #BS-0101) either alone or functionalized with Lam-
units.rationale: Creates a biomaterial matrix for organoid growth.

units.title: Measure cell viability with CyQuant assay
units.text: Cell viability was measured using the colorimetric CyQuant cell proliferation assay (Invitrogen), following the manufacturer’s instructions. Absorbance was analyzed at 480–520 nm, using 50,000 cells harvested.
units.rationale: Quantifies live cell numbers to assess culture health.

units.title: Detect apoptosis by flow cytometry
units.text: Apoptosis was detected via flow cytometry staining using the Alexa Fluor 647 Annexin V conjugate (BD Pharmingen, #A23204) and Click-iT plus Tunel assay (Invitrogen #C10617) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
units.rationale: Evaluates programmed cell death within organoids.

units.title: Culture organoids under hypoxic conditions
units.text: Both conventional and silk-VM organoids were cultured at 37 °C in 21% O2 and 5% CO2 in normoxia conditions. For hypoxia analysis, organoids were transferred to the hypoxia chamber (Binder CB160), which was filled with 1% O2 and 5% CO2 and mixed with N2, and collected after 4, 8, and 16 h.
units.rationale: Tests organoid response to low‑oxygen environments.
